entities.description: The count of survey responses for a particular category without applying any sampling weights.
Different numerical responses provided for the survey question.
The count and percentage of survey data that is missing or not provided.
Summary statistics computed from the valid cases in the survey data, including mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
Information about the positioning (width, decimal places) of the variable in the dataset.
Describes the type and format of the variable, which is numeric in this context.
The number of valid survey responses used to compute the statistical summary statistics.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the count of survey responses without sampling weights.
Defines different numerical responses provided for the survey question.
Relates the survey to the information about missing data and its percentage.
Relates the survey to the statistical summary computed from the valid cases in the survey data.
Describes the positioning information of the variable in the dataset.
Defines the type and format of the survey variable.
The number of valid survey responses used to compute summary statistics.
